---
id: delete-multiple-promotion-codes
title: "Delete Multiple Promotion Codes"
description: "Use this endpoint to delete multiple promotion codes within a specific promotion."
sidebar_label: "Delete Multiple Promotion Codes"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Multiple Promotion Codes"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v2/promotions/{promotionID}/codes"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint to delete multiple promotion codes within a specific promotion.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
